column4: This might be a bit out of place, but perhaps someone can point me in the right direction anyways. I'm wondering if anyone knows of a good software package for turning some xvid and divx files into DVD that will play in a regular DVD player.
I had some programs in WinXP that woudl take care of this, but I don't know how to tackle this from Ubuntu
devede is a nice one.. gui based and all
sounds right.. X can do this..or so I've heard
